sourcesContent: import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const EditPost = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState(post.email); const [title, setTitle] = useState(""); const [body, setBody] = useState(""); const params = useParams() const [post, setPost] = useState({}) const findPostById = () => fetch(`https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts/${params.id}`) .then(res => res.json()) .then(p => setPost(p)) useEffect(findPostById, []) return( <>
